actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in accordance with the Act of August 25, 1916, as amended, and supplemented.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire and maintain the site in Auburn, Massachusetts, on which Dr. Robert H. Goddard launched the first liquid-propelled rocket. Authorizes such appropriations as necessary to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in accordance with the Act of August 25, 1916, as amended, and supplemented.
